title: Smartbox Locker Reservation Module
summary: Locker availability, reservation lifecycle, allocation, and release workflow APIs.
description: Designed and maintained microservices powering locker availability checks, reservation lifecycle management, allocation rules, and release workflows. Focused on reliability, concurrency safety, and clean REST architecture for seamless customer experiences.
highlights: Built reservation lifecycle APIs with concurrency-safe workflows
Implemented allocation and release rules for high-traffic usage
Designed clean REST endpoints aligned with domain boundaries
technologies: Java | Spring Boot | REST APIs | MySQL | Kubernetes

title: Payment Gateway Integration
summary: Multi-gateway payments with secure APIs and idempotent webhook handling.
technologies: Spring Boot | Razorpay | CCAvenue | Webhooks | JWT
description: Integrated Razorpay and CCAvenue payment gateways into a secure backend stack. Implemented idempotent webhook processing, payment status reconciliation, and failure recovery to ensure consistent transaction outcomes.
highlights: Integrated two payment gateways with unified workflows
Implemented idempotent webhook handlers for reliability
Automated payment status updates for downstream services

title: WhatsApp Notification Service
summary: WhatsApp messaging with delivery and read-status tracking via webhooks.
technologies: WhatsApp Cloud API | Spring Boot | Webhooks
description: Built a notification microservice using WhatsApp Cloud API to send transactional updates. Implemented webhook-driven delivery and read-status tracking to ensure message observability and reliable customer communication.
highlights: Automated WhatsApp notifications with Cloud API
Structured logs for observability and support

title: Face Recognition Service
summary: Face detection and recognition with APIs to store and identify faces.
description: Implemented face detection and recognition capabilities using OpenCV. Delivered APIs to store face embeddings, identify faces, and support downstream verification workflows.
highlights: Built face detection and recognition APIs
Stored and matched face embeddings for identification
Optimized processing for reliable response times
